channel.title: Conductor - The coda to your cloud management problems.
channel.description: Recent content on Conductor - The coda to your cloud management problems.

item.title: AT-1
item.description: Apply industry recommended measures across all your cloud resources using one command: “conductor solution enable x”. Where out of the box Conductor solutions fall short of the mark for you, quickly prototype and develop solutions without worrying about how they will be shipped, deployed and executed. With the Conductor solutions SDK you can effortlessly interact with your service providers and system or access resource data, policies and events. Conductors simple solutions framework for Cloud ITSM can get you and your team developing solutions to complicated problems today.

item.title: C-1
item.description: Apply industry recommended measures across all your cloud resources using one command: “conductor solution enable x”. Where out of the box Conductor solutions fall short of the mark for you, quickly prototype and develop solutions without worrying about how they will be shipped, deployed and executed. With the Conductor solutions SDK you can effortlessly interact with your service providers and system or access resource data, policies and events. Conductors simple solutions framework for Cloud ITSM can get you and your team developing solutions to complicated problems today.

item.title: Data and Application Owners
item.description: Establish the link between your service portfolios, data sets and cloud infrastructure. Conductor allows insight not just into what a particular resource is, but HOW it relates to other resources and what the impact of that relationship is. Understand what the critical chain looks like for you and yours, what happens when a link in the chain is compromised and manage the measures in play to prevent this.

Conductors simple solutions framework for Cloud ITSM can get you and your team developing solutions to complicated problems today.

item.title: Governance or Compliance Managers
item.description: Make policies work for you, ensuring that compliance requirements are met throughout every cloud resources ITSM lifecycle at both the macro and micro levels. Conductor simplifies the construction and enforcement of complex resource, application and data policies through simple-to-build and delegate rules. With Conductor capable solutions, you are able to monitor all policies that are in play for any set of resources at any time.
